Motivation.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
Motivation.author: Gary Player

Motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivation.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Motivation.author: Winston Churchill

Motivation.quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivation.author: Sam Levenson

Motivation.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Motivation.author: Chris Grosser

Wisdom.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right.
Wisdom.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Wisdom.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
Wisdom.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Wisdom.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Wisdom.author: Aristotle

Wisdom.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Wisdom.author: Socrates

Humor.quote: My wife told me to stop impersonating a flamingo. I had to put my foot down.
Humor.author: Unknown

Humor.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
Humor.author: Will Ferrell

Humor.quote: I refuse to join any club that would have me as a member.
Humor.author: Groucho Marx

Humor.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
Humor.author: Steven Wright

Humor.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
Humor.author: Al McGuire
